behavior.name: three_dimesional_coverage_path_planning_precomputations
behavior.author: Katrin Becker
behavior.description: This behavior handles the precomputations for the 3D coverage path planning.

param.name: for_mission_execution_manager
param.label: for_mission_execution_manager_usage
param.hint: If the data are stored for the usage with the mission execution manager or general usage.

param.name: load_models
param.label: load_models
param.hint: If the models shoudl be loaded or computed from mesh.
